name: TER
description:
TER is a short game about exploration and puzzle solving, set on a fictional planetary body that orbits Earth.

Controls (Based off the limitation)

Move: LMB

Jump: RMB

Interact: MMB (Mouse 3)

Raise/Lower Lantern: Scroll

Alt + f4 to quit if not on title screen

Please let me know if you have any problems, especially with the mac/linux builds, as they are largely untested. No web version as of now, as some of the audio manipulation I used is unsupported.

(Don't tell the jam mods, but E also works instead of middle mouse, for those who don't have a middle mouse button :]   )

May the eye guide you.
